game.name: Suiren
game.shortDescription: "Suiren" is a 2D platformer game in which you use the power of nature to perform various actions and progress through the stages. One day, a fire of unknown cause breaks out, and it is solved by utilizing the power of water and the natural forces of various regions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Suiren" is a 2D platformer game in which you use the power of nature to perform various actions and progress through the stages. One day, a fire of unknown cause breaks out, and it is solved by utilizing the power of water and the natural forces of various regions.
